After performing the [[hand seal]]s (or rather, chant them out loud like an incantation), the user releases a dark shock wave that destroys the talismans on the [[Shrine Seal]], and shatters the stone door, releasing [[Mōryō]]'s entrapped soul. This may be a variation of the Shrine Seal, or even the counterpart, as it contains a portion of the hand seals that the sealing technique does.

[[pl:Pieczęć Świątyni: Uwolnienie]]
